parameters.name: ascOrder
parameters.description: Specifies whether to sort data in ascending order.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date on which the statistics are collected, in days. Set this parameter to a value in the `YYYYMMdd` format.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The name of the MaxCompute project.

parameters.name: recentDays
parameters.description: The number of recent days for comparison.

parameters.name: tablePrefix
parameters.description: The name of the table that you want to use for fuzzy match.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can log on to the MaxCompute console, and choose **Tenants** > **Tenant Property** from the left-side navigation pane to view the tenant ID.
